post.description:
Create Contract for:
1. pmd = OT, SV, MV, EN, ENI, EDC, EIP, ECI, EDE (open procedures - OpenTender)
2. pmd = GPA, RT (selective procedures - RestrictedTender)
3. pmd = DA, NP, CD, DC, IP (negotiation procedures - NegotiationTender)
4. pmd = RFQ, MC, DCO (in SSC procedures - Framework)

measure.example: Can be other types: number, integer, boolean
